name: ValueofPi
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: value of pi
des:
Pi is an irrational number, that is, it is a real number that cannot be expressed by a simple fraction. That's because pi is what mathematicians call an "infinite decimal".

This Skill 'Value of Pi' will read the Pi value endlessly. Thats the real fun of mathematics!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
